description: This file provides utility functions for file synchronization and JSON settings persistence within the Utils namespace. It includes functions to synchronize file states with the filesystem and to persist JSON configuration data to files.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes a given file by flushing its buffers and syncing it to disk to ensure data persistence.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists a JSON value into a specified file under a given key, creating or updating the file as needed, and then synchronizes the file to disk.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
